name: unstressed
content:
unstressed adjective
(NOT WORRIED)
Add to word list
Add to word list
not feeling worried; feeling relaxed and not experiencing stress: She said that she was feeling completely unstressed about the wedding.

unstressed adjective
(PRONUNCIATION)
phonetics, literature
  specialized (of a word or syllable) not pronounced with stress (= emphasis) : Most words that are made up of more than one syllable have at least one stressed syllable and one unstressed syllable.
